text: 🚨 Ukraine war updates: China's Xi lays out 4 priorities to resolve Ukraine 'crisis'; Russia intensifies efforts to seize key town 🇺🇦🏔️💥 U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen urges House of Representatives to pass a Ukraine aid bill, emphasizing the importance of military and budget support 💪🏼💬 "There's no substitute" for Congressional action on Ukraine aid, says Yellen 🗣️🔍 G7 leaders debate legal options to support Ukraine, manage risks 🤝📢 Let's keep the pressure on Russia and stand with Ukraine! 💪🏼🇺🇦
